plot: A photo-taking Nozomu is accused of being a spy. Meanwhile, Chiri attempts to divide the world into a 50-50 ratio.
title: "Zoku sayonara zetsubô sensei" Supainatsu Purin/Bakuro no mi no Jukusuru Toki/Hanbun Torimonocho
plot_es: A photo-taking Nozomu is accused of being a spy. Meanwhile, Chiri attempts to divide the world into a 50-50 ratio.
original_name: "Zoku sayonara zetsubô sensei" Supainatsu Purin/Bakuro no mi no Jukusuru Toki/Hanbun Torimonocho
